scenes.text: Hi, we are ABACUS, the Association of British And Chinese University Students. A society that  welcomes people of all nationalities to meet new people and get involved. For international students, we want to be a 'home away from home while for people from the UK, we want to be a gateway for you to experience Chinese and Far-Eastern culture!
We do not have a regular meeting time weekly, but we often have socials which we share on our SU page and our social medias.
Our membership is Â£5.00, but most events will still require tickets, even for free events due to limited capacity, although paid events are often discounted for members.
Our socials consist of icebreakers, parties, dinners, balls, karaoke and clubbing, movie nights, sports and more!
